main event: At approximately 0615 on November 14, 1957, observers at Johnson Air Base in Japan reported seeing an object shaped like a fountain pen with a long thin tail, hovering in the sky before climbing out of sight.
interesting points: The object was compared in size to a 9 inch pencil,Observers had an initial impression that it might be a cloud due to light reflection,, Estimates suggest it was at a pitch angle of 60 degrees during its ascent,The weather was clear with scattered clouds at the time of observation,Observers reported that the object left a visible trail which quickly dissipated.
sighted object: an object shaped like a fountain pen
witness description: Air Police officers, one was a desk sergeant and the other was an airman.
